verses.name: Numbers 20:1
verses.text: Then came the children of Israel, even the whole congregation, into the desert of Zin in the first month: and the people abode in Kadesh; and Miriam died there, and was buried there.

verses.name: Numbers 20:2
verses.text: And there was no water for the congregation: and they gathered themselves together against Moses and against Aaron.

verses.name: Numbers 20:3
verses.text: And the people chode with Moses, and spake, saying, Would God that we had died when our brethren died before the Lord!

verses.name: Numbers 20:4
verses.text: And why have ye brought up the congregation of the Lord into this wilderness, that we and our cattle should die there?
